item.title: Dragon CTF 2020 Writeup
item.description: Written from the perspective of Mystiz. babykok writeup by GeoffreyY. .alert { padding: 20px; color: white; margin-bottom: 15px; } .alert.success { background-color: #28a745; } .alert.info { background-color: #17a2b8; } .alert.warning { background-color: #ffc107; color: #212529; } .alert.danger { background-color: #dc3545; } Dragon CTF 2020 is definitely had my best CTF moments. There are big brain moments and I have been mind-blown for multiple times during the game. This time we have teamed up with @blackb6a.
